features: 💯【2024 Updated Small In Size, Big On Function Portable Fan】 Combined with Fan + Backup Power function ① Work as a Backup Power, the output port can charge your phone in an emergency. ② The handheld fan with LED screen, you can know more clear about the speed and the battery capacity to recharge in time. ③Portable Travel fan would be an everyday-carry-essential fan to cool you off in hot day and is multifunctional to satisfy your diverse needs.

🏕️【Multipurpose Design Portable Handheld Fan】This portable fan is 3 in 1 fan. ① Handheld fan, very convenient to take out for outsoor activities or travel. ② Mini desk fan, 180° foldable, rotate it as mini desk fan. ③ Neck fan, comes with a lanyard, can hang on your neck make hands free. EasyAcc dedicated to offer high quality products with better price and service.

🍃【Ultra Quiet 5 Speed Strong Wind Up to 18H】New version usb fan, Increase into 5 speed level supporting 18 working hours, more optional for you. And the most important, we have make optimization of the noisy. Some of you may troubled for the noisy, please choose this fan, one of the main feature is low noisy, <36db.

💫【LED Indicator & 180° Foldable】The personal fan with digital display screen, you can know more clear about the speed and the battery capacity to recharge in time. The 180° foldable not only reduces the size of the mini fan for portable, but also allows you to adjust the angle of the fan for more comfortable use in desk.

⚡【Emergency Backup Power】The portable fan can also work as Backup Power, the Micro port can provide charging for your phone in case of emergency. The electric cooling fan with dual ports. TYPE-C fast charging port takes only 3 hours for fully charge the handheld fan.

💝【Summer Assistant And Gift for Hot Flash】Portable hand fan, desk fan, neck fan, emergency backup power for phone very suitable for use at home, office, travel, shopping, camping. And nice gift for women who suffer from hot flash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EasyAcc Mini Handheld Fan USB Desk Fan with 4000mAh Rechargeable Battery Operated
reviews.reviewText: I have other fans in the house I use when my electric power is on; however it is Summer now and with it comes the dreaded power outages that Summer brings with it.With this in mind I ordered this fan to have a bit of comfort from the heat for when the lights are out.I'm really impressed with this little guy. How did EasyAcc manage to squeeze such a good strong wind breeze plus such a long runtime into this fan? Beats the heck out of me; I just know it works.I wish I would have had this fan last year; and the year before that; and the year before that; and for many years before that.When I'm holding this fan and looking at how it's made it really looks to be a high quality item; not cheap or flimsy in any way. It feels solidly built and I am looking forward to a long service life from it.Like I say I bought it for emergencies when the power is out so I don't use it a lot, or even every day. But that's not to say you can't use it every day. I have no doubt it would stand up to daily use.There are other fans on Amazon similar to this fan but I chose this fan specifically because IT IS an EasyAcc product.EasyAcc is not a fly-by-night brand name. They make top quality products; especially their line of lithium ion battery powerbanks, of which I own several. (All bought and payed for by me.)I bought myself some peace of mind for this Summer's heat when I bought this fan. Power outages will be more tolerable for me now this Summer. I'm glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST little Fan!!!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is so compact it can fit in almost all purses. Even most of my evening clutches!! It has a powerful motor and gives a quiet stream of airflow.Two of my friends have already it bought since they saw me with it! LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It work very well, but it’s smaller than the picture.
reviews.reviewText: The battery life is wonderful, charged once since I purchased on June 23 battery time last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 24 hours
reviews.reviewText: The fan makes wired noise after 24 hours of using. At this point, it’s not working at all. And it’s been only one day of using it . I bought it for a vacation and now I’m here in this heat helplessUpdate: Fan has been working since this review. The problem was my battery. I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice while it lasted
reviews.reviewText: This was a long-lasting and surprisingly effective fan while it worked, but the charging was always temperamental. It was tricky plugging in the micro-USB charger and the charging light wouldn't always come on. Now, it doesn't charge at all, and so the fan is not useful. Unfortunately, this happened only days after the return period closed, so we have a non-functional fan. Highly recommend their desk fan, also operates via USB but hard-wired into the fan and no battery, only runs when plugged in. The portable fan, give it a miss if you expect it to last longer than 30 days.UPDATE -- I changed the rating from two to four stars as the company was responsive. Even though the product was beyond the return window, EasyAcc sent me a new replacement. It has been working fine for the past week and has a remarkable run time -- thank you to a customer-service-minded company that stands behind its products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great fan! No complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband has cancer and gets frequent, severe hot flashes from his meds. This little fan gets used by him many times a day...He really likes it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small Small too Small
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is powerful, BUT it's simply too small, so I'll be returning and trying to find one that's larger.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dalle immagini non si può capire il prodotto
reviews.reviewText: Non pensavo fosse un articolo così solido e ben fatto. Oltre allo stile elegante raffredda molto bene. Tre velocità ma una rumorosità molto accettabile. Per il prezzo pagato posso dire che è veramente consigliato.
Klein, stark, leise. Super Teil für unterwegs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect. It is easily hand held and works to cool you instantly. Totally safe as the fins are enclosed. Last summer it was essential. If like me you are always hot then this is an absolute must. There is only one button so it's Pulse - Low - Medium - High - Off which won't suit everyone but it a fantastic bit of reliable and rugged technology which I highly recommend.
Ottima qualità della plastica, ottima ventilazione, molto leggero, piccolo: s'infila ovunque. Ormai non me ne separo più. vivamente consigliato per quest'estate sahariana 2022.
